name: Let Me Out (Hackn'tosh)
description:
Your friend is capture, it's up to you to save them. Utilising the power new OS called Hackn' Toast, use simple command prompts to open doors and create sounds to distract the guards so your friend can escape undetected.

The theme for this Game Jam was "Out of Control" so we approached the theme in 2 ways.
1. You play as a hacker trying to lead your friend out of a prison complex. He moves on his own so he is out of your control. All you can do is assist him with his escape while giving him verbal hints through the environment.
2. Your computer is infected with Malware so you have no control over the pop ups that appear. All you can do is close or move them.

If you are having trouble, typing /help will display a list of all commands you can perform. Typing in /help with a command name will provide an example.
